name: Retro Jingles Pack
description:
Contains 25 melody files in case your game needed that little OOOOMPF.

You need that quick Legend of Zelda jingle when you open a chest? I GOTCHU!

Except, you know, everything is original.. So I don't have you with the zelda chest sound, but I have replacers for that! Level up jingles, death jingles, cute jingles, futuristic jingles, strange enemy jingles, you name it!

Enjoy!

MP3 Format!
